events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

events.eventText:
As you approach the base, the endless dunes soon give way to a wide, open area, with the Imperial base build atop a large pit in the sands. Automated defense stations are shooting at some unseen target in orbit.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Impassable terrain does not block movement. When a non-Massive figure without “Mobile” voluntarily crosses an impassable edge, that figure suffers 2 {C}.
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent defense stations.

eventActions.tbText:
Imperial forces patrol the exterior of the base, keeping a safe distance from the pit.

{-} The Empire receives additional {D} at the start of each round.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The sarlacc from the Great Pit of Carkoon is waiting, hungry.

{-} When a figure ends its movement in the Sarlacc Pit, it suffers 10 {H}.

The sarlacc from the Great Pit of Carkoon is waiting, hungry.

{-} When a figure ends its movement in the Sarlacc Pit, it suffers 10 {H}.

eventActions.tbText:
Inside the pit, tentacles are twisting and whipping through the air, and an enormous beak eagerly snaps for anything that dares to come too close. The mighty sarlacc is ever hungry.

{-} When a figure ends its movement in the Sarlacc Pit (red highlight), it suffers 10 {H}.
{-} Once during his activation, a hero can choose an adjacent, small, hostile figure and test {K}. If successful, he may push that figure up to 1 space. If he receives 2 or more successes, he may push that figure up to 2 spaces instead.

Suddenly, your comlink crackles, and a choppy communication comes in on your Alliance channel: "Here...for extraction... heavy fire...help us... shut down defenses...” It appears the Alliance finally got your emergency signal, and has sent an extraction team. You hurry toward the base.

{-} Doors are locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The mission will progress when a door to the base opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Impassable terrain does not block movement. When a non-Massive figure without “Mobile” voluntarily crosses an impassable edge, that figure suffers 2 {C}.
{-} Once during his activation, a hero can choose an adjacent, small, hostile figure and test {K}. If successful, he may push that figure up to 1 space. If he receives 2 or more successes, he may push that figure up to 2 spaces instead.
{-} When a figure ends its movement in the Sarlacc Pit, it suffers 10 {H}.
{-} Doors are locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The mission will progress when a door to the base opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
With your mission complete, you retreat from the remaining Imperials and sprint away across the Dune Sea.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 2 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

The Empire bears down on you. You slowly lose more and more ground until being forced to abandon the mission, failing both Jabba and the Alliance.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to slice into the base's systems.

{-} Test {J} or {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the Imperial security systems keep booting you out. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the terminal for each {B} result gained.

events.eventText:
A red light blares on the console as the system’s defenses engage, leaving you only seconds before it shuts itself down. "Very good", Jabba's droid says through your comlink. "Get the codes and prepare for extraction."

Only a heartbeat later, the Alliance channel crackles again. "Taking heavy fire... on approach vector... need help!"

You are going to have to make a decision.

{-} The decision you are about to make will change how the rest of the campaign plays out.

eventActions.mainText: Do you want to shut down the defenses to protect the extraction team of the Rebel Alliance, or steal the codes to turn over the base to Jabba the Hutt?

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The central console controls the systems of the Imperial orbital defense and logistics base.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I} or {J}) to try and slice the system.

events.eventText: Your attacks blow open the door to the base.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A security door leads into the Imperial base.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).

events.eventText: Your attacks blow open the door to the base.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A security door leads into the Imperial base.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).

events.eventText: You make your way through the blasted remains of the door into the small Imperial base.

eventActions.tbText: Immediately, guards in scarlet armor advance to face you.
The central console is blinking, data running across its screens. This is what you're looking for.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The central console controls the systems of the Imperial orbital defense and logistics base.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I} or {J}) to try and slice the system.

{-} The mission will progress when the system is sliced.

{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: The weak point crumbles under the Imperial attacks.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The fortifications of the Imperial base are weak at this point.

{-} Imperial figures can attack weak points (Health: 6, Defense: 1 {G}). Figures don't block line of sight to weak points.
{-} When an attack targeting a weak point is declared, a healthy Rebel that is on or adjacent to that weak point may add 1 black die to the weak point's defense. After the attack is resolved, that Rebel suffers 1 {H} for each {G} rolled.

events.eventText: The defense station crumbles into a pile of rubble and scrap metal.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: An automated defense station lies dormant, half buried in the sand.

events.eventText: The defense station crumbles into a pile of rubble and scrap metal.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: An automated defense station lies dormant, half buried in the sand.

events.eventText: The defense station crumbles into a pile of rubble and scrap metal.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: An automated defense station lies dormant, half buried in the sand.

events.eventText:
“Well done,” Jabba says to you through his droid. “Jabba's men are standing by. They'll help take care of those troopers, and once you take down the exterior defenses, they'll be ready to extract you.” 

The com channel to the Rebel ships is eerily silent.

{-} The mission no longer ends at the end of Round 6.
{-} The Empire no longer receives additional {D}.

eventActions.tbText: Imperial soldiers rush in to stop you from destroying the exterior defenses. "Blast them!", an officer shouts.

eventActions.repositionText: Be on or adjacent to a defense station.

eventActions.tbText:
The defense stations are slowly shifting their focus towards Jabba's approaching forces.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a defense station (Health: 8, Defense: 1 {G}). Add 1 black die to the defense station's defense pool if there is 1 or more Imperial figures on or adjacent to that defense station. Figures do not block line of sight to defense stations.
{-} The Rebels win when all defense stations are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose if they haven't destroyed the defense stations at the end of the third Round after this Round, or when all heroes are wounded.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The automated defense station has been activated, protecting the exterior of the base.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a defense station (Health: 8, Defense: 1 {G}). Add 1 black die to the defense station's defense pool if there is 1 or more Imperial figures on or adjacent to that defense station. Figures do not block line of sight to defense stations.

The automated defense station has been activated, protecting the exterior of the base.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a defense station (Health: 8, Defense: 1 {G}). Add 1 black die to the defense station's defense pool if there is 1 or more Imperial figures on or adjacent to that defense station. Figures do not block line of sight to defense stations.

The automated defense station has been activated, protecting the exterior of the base.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a defense station (Health: 8, Defense: 1 {G}). Add 1 black die to the defense station's defense pool if there is 1 or more Imperial figures on or adjacent to that defense station. Figures do not block line of sight to defense stations.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Impassable terrain does not block movement. When a non-Massive figure without “Mobile” voluntarily crosses an impassable edge, that figure suffers 2 {C}.
{-} Once during his activation, a hero can choose an adjacent, small, hostile figure and test {K}. If successful, he may push that figure up to 1 space. If he receives 2 or more successes, he may push that figure up to 2 spaces instead.
{-} When a figure ends its movement in the Sarlacc Pit, it suffers 10 {H}.
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent defense stations.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack a defense station (Health: 8, Defense: 1 {G}). Add 1 black die to the defense station's defense pool if there is 1 or more Imperial figures on or adjacent to that defense station. Figures do not block line of sight to defense stations.
{-} The Rebels win when all defense stations are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose if they haven't destroyed the defense stations at the end of the third Round after this Round, or when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
"The Mighty Jabba is most displeased," you hear Jabba’s droid through your comlink. At the same time, you hear Terro’s voice amplified across the field to his troops: "Destroy it, you fools. Better for the base to be rubble than in their hands!" All doors to the base slide open, leaving you exposed.

{-} The mission no longer ends at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A security door leads into the Imperial base.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).

A security door leads into the Imperial base.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).

eventActions.tbText: At the very least, you managed one impressive feat: You made even more enemies. Jabba's mercenaries and the Imperial forces have stopped fighting and are now focusing their attention on you.

"Thank you," comes a voice through the Alliance channel, now clearly audible. "We are on approach. You just need to keep that base standing for a little longer until we can triangulate your position and send you extraction coordinates. We'll get you outta there!"

Easier said than done.

The fortifications of the Imperial base are weak at this point.

{-} Imperial figures can attack weak points (Health: 6, Defense: 1 {G}). Figures do not block line of sight to weak points.
{-} When an attack targeting a weak point is declared, a healthy Rebel that is on or adjacent to that weak point may add 1 black die to the weak point's defense pool. After the attack is resolved, that Rebel suffers 1 {H} for each {G} rolled.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent weak points.
{-} Imperial figures can attack weak points (Health: 6, Defense: 1 {G}). Figures do not block line of sight to weak points.
{-} When an attack targeting a weak point is declared, a healthy Rebel that is on or adjacent to that weak point may add 1 black die to the weak point's defense pool. After the attack is resolved, that Rebel suffers 1 {H} for each {G} rolled.

Luckily, now that you have diverted the defense stations from blasting the extraction team, you can set them to aim at more interesting targets.

{-} At the end of each Round, before clicking "End Round", for each defense station, the heroes choose an Imperial figure in line of sight of that defense station. That figure suffers 1 {H}.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The defense stations are targeting your enemies now.

{-} At the end of each Round, before clicking "End Round", for each defense station, the heroes choose an Imperial figure in line of sight of that defense station. That figure suffers 1 {H}.

{-} At the end of each Round, before clicking "End Round", for each defense station, the heroes choose an Imperial figure in line of sight of that defense station. That figure suffers 1 {H}.

eventActions.tbText:
It is on. You grab your weapons and take cover behind the sand dunes. Just a little longer.

{-} The Rebels win at the end of the third Round after this Round.
{-} The Rebels lose when 4 weak points have been destroyed.

eventActions.shortText: Defend the base. Weak points destroyed: &Weak Points&/4.

eventActions.theText:

events.eventText:
You receive a communication from an Alliance pilot, "Thank you for your efforts. Our entry was successful enough, and soon we'll be ready to begin extraction."

{-} Place Story Mission card "From All Sides" into play. Heroes earn Rebel Troopers, Rebel Saboteurs, and Alliance Rangers as allies.

Bib Fortuna contacts you on your comlink: "Jabba thanks you for your loyalty. We will begin the transport of your friends shortly." You look up into the sky and see the fires of the Alliance's failed battle.

{-} Place Story Mission card "Dangerous Allies" into play. During the next Rebel Upgrade Stage, heroes may search the Tier I Item deck for 1 card and add it to the available Item cards. Reduce the cost of that Item by 100 credits.
